name: ModFactor
details:
Pedal with 10 Studio Quality Modulation EffectsAll the standards - Chorus, Flanger, Phaser as well as Rotary, Tremolo, and Vibrato are there. Also included is the unique Undulator effect from the H8000 and a RingMod that lands somewhere between ring modulation and synthesis. The dedicated SLOW/FAST footswitch for ramping the LFO rate comes in handy. LFO rates can also sync to Tap Tempo and MIDI clock
Modulate your Modulator: Two LFOs create rich expressive modulation effects. 
100 Presets
    Studio Quality Sound
    Instant Program Change
    Real-time control with 10 knobs, MIDI or expression pedal
    Tap Tempo and MIDI Clock Sync/Generate
    True Analog Bypass
    Rugged cast metal construction
    Metal footswitches for instant Preset access
    Mono or Stereo operation
    Guitar or Line Level Inputs and Outputs
https://www.eventideaudio.com/products/stompboxes/chorus-flanger/modfactor
